message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective on the price.  To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $1,000,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $800,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $950,000. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
